name: Mech Storm
description:
Mech Storm is a game jam entry for GBJam 7

In Mech Storm you take control of a mech as you invade the enemy base. This version is still early. Still much to add to the game but We'll be doing that after the submission deadline.  Expect to see some better things to come as time goes on.

Credits

Programming - Garlock009

Art - Manovermars & Willphase1

Music and Sound Effects - @chasebethea
